title: ESCUELA GRIND Announces US Tour Dates With CHAIN GANG & DECAYER
description: Kicking off on February 16 in Pensacola, FL.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 7 hours ago
excerpt: Kicking off on February 16 in Pensacola, FL.
text: Escuela Grind has announced a handful of tour dates for this February and March with openers Chain Gang and Decayer. The tour kicks off on February 16 at Subculture in Pensacola, FL and wraps up on March 2 at Reggie's in Chicago, IL. Get your tickets here. "SURPRISE! Our Dreams on America tour in February is just now announced!" wrote Escuela Grind of the trek. "We are incredibly excited to play with Chain Gang and Decayer and to hit some new locations we've never played!!! Tickets are available through links on our website and directly." 2/16 Pensacola, FL Subculture2/18 Birmingham, AL LCY Media2/20 Columbia, MO Rose Music Hall2/22 Dallas, TX TX Tea House2/23 Austin, TX Come And Take It2/25 Denver, CO The Marquis2/27 Sioux Falls, SD Club2/28 Iowa City, IA Wildwood3/1 Lincoln, NE 1867 Bar3/2 Chicago, IL Reggie's Want More Metal? html:
Escuela Grind has announced a handful of tour dates for this February and March with openers Chain Gang and Decayer. The tour kicks off on February 16 at Subculture in Pensacola, FL and wraps up on March 2 at Reggie's in Chicago, IL. Get your tickets here.

"SURPRISE! Our Dreams on America tour in February is just now announced!" wrote Escuela Grind of the trek. "We are incredibly excited to play with Chain Gang and Decayer and to hit some new locations we've never played!!! Tickets are available through links on our website and directly."

2/16 Pensacola, FL Subculture
2/18 Birmingham, AL LCY Media
2/20 Columbia, MO Rose Music Hall
2/22 Dallas, TX TX Tea House
2/23 Austin, TX Come And Take It
2/25 Denver, CO The Marquis
2/27 Sioux Falls, SD Club
2/28 Iowa City, IA Wildwood
3/1 Lincoln, NE 1867 Bar
3/2 Chicago, IL Reggie's
